text: Oumar Yaya Mahamat, known as Modou Kouta is a Chadian former international football player and football manager. From September 2011 to December 2013 he coached Chad national football team.Profile at Soccerpunter.com Mahamat, returned as coach of Chad in 2015, taking control of matches against Egypt in November 2015. == References == ==External links== * * Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Gazelle FC Category:Living people Category:Chadian footballers Category:Chadian football managers Category:Chad national football team managers Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Association football midfielders
title: Modou Kouta
